I have a cool easy blow dart so what i do: get parper,scissors,glue/tape,and a pencil. So u make a 4-5 lenght and 3 width inch rectangle wrap it around the pencil like a rice roll and tape these
-|—-|—|- now you make a small cone when ur done tape the cone to the tip of the roll and blow the hole to see if any air comes out if it doesn’t its close to perfect and use a straw put trough the roll and blow the straw and it will fly
